column1: Smoque BBQ////As for my pulled pork.  It was tender as can be.  Thank god it didn't taste as smokey as the ribs.  The sandwich was huge
column2: I couldn't finish.  Fries were fresh cut tater style and plenty of them.  Slaw was good
column3: not to much mayo (maybe there wasn't any at all) but unfortunately they were peppered with raw red onions that don't sit well in my stomach so I couldn't enjoy them.  My husband slurped them up.
